item.title: A Simple Bash Script to Reverse SSH Tunnel Automatically
item.description: While, this post will be very simple since it’s more like a note for my personal use. If you’d like to know what is the SSH Tunnel, what is the SSH port forwarding, or how to reverse SSH tunnel, please Google it. The following script will try to connect to another server automatically every 10 seconds. Remember to run it using tmux or screen so it can stay in the background when you are disconnected.
